text.author: Kelly, William Albert
text.title: State v. Kelly, 2013 Tenn. Crim. App. LEXIS 890, *4-5, 2013 WL 5657672 (Tenn. Crim. App. October 16, 2013)
text.summary: In this letter, an inmate in jail threatens a woman, who works at Walgreens and has perpetrated an insurance scam and stolen some things, that they will reveal this to the police and testify against her unless the woman drops the charges that put the author of the letter in jail, resulting in 3-5 years in jail for a class E felony.
